name: contractkit
description: Generate complete smart contract projects from safe templates. Scaffold, test, deploy, and interact with Foundry-based contracts.
author: ContractKit Contributors

skills.name: new
skills.description: Scaffold a new smart contract project from a template

skills.name: test
skills.description: Format and run tests for the current project

skills.name: local
skills.description: Start a local Anvil blockchain for development

skills.name: deploy
skills.description: Deploy contracts to local or testnet

skills.name: status
skills.description: Show project status and deployment information

skills.name: explain
skills.description: Explain what a contract does and its risks

skills.name: audit-lite
skills.description: Generate a risk checklist (not an audit)

requirements.installInstructions: Install Foundry: curl -L https://foundry.paradigm.xyz | bash && foundryup
